headline: Is the Stock Market Open Today? Here Are the Trading Hours for Martin Luther King Jr. Day.
summary: Martin Luther King Jr. Day has arrived, bringing investors a day to digest a flurry of recent news items.  Is the Stock Market Open or Closed on Martin Luther King Jr. Day?  The New York Stock Exchange and the Nasdaq Stock Market will be closed on Monday.

content.title: Is the Stock Market Open Today? Here Are the Trading Hours for Martin Luther King Jr. Day.

headline: Micron Says AI-Driven Memory Crunch is ‘Unprecedented’
summary: “The shortage we are seeing is really unprecedented,” Micron Executive Vice President of Operations Manish Bhatia said in an interview shortly after the chipmaker held a groundbreaking ceremony for a $100 billion production site outside Syracuse, New York, on Friday, amplifying a similar forecast the company provided in December.  High-bandwidth memory required to make artificial intelligence accelerators is “consuming so much of the available capacity across the industry that it’s leaving a tremendous shortage for the conventional side of the industry, for phones or PCs,” Bhatia said.

content.title: Micron Says AI-Driven Memory Crunch is ‘Unprecedented’
content.summary: “The shortage we are seeing is really unprecedented,” Micron Executive Vice President of Operations Manish Bhatia said in an interview shortly after the chipmaker held a groundbreaking ceremony for a $100 billion production site outside Syracuse, New York, on Friday, amplifying a similar forecast the company provided in December.  High-bandwidth memory required to make artificial intelligence accelerators is “consuming so much of the available capacity across the industry that it’s leaving a tremendous shortage for the conventional side of the industry, for phones or PCs,” Bhatia said.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Micron Technology (MU) After 244% One-Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Micron Technology's share price reflects its true worth, or if the market has run ahead of itself, you are not alone in asking that question right now. The stock most recently closed at US$362.75, with returns of 4.9% over 7 days, 36.4% over 30 days, 15.0% year to date, 244.2% over 1 year and a very large gain over 3 years. headline: Latest News In AI Chips - Micron Boosts DRAM Capacity with Strategic Taiwan Acquisition
summary: Micron Technology has strategically moved to acquire Powerchip Semiconductor Manufacturing Corporation’s P5 fabrication site in Tongluo, Taiwan, for $1.8 billion, aiming to enhance its global presence in the memory solutions sector. This acquisition, including a sizable 300,000 square feet of cleanroom space, positions Micron to meet the increasing global demand for memory by boosting DRAM production capabilities. The initiative aligns with Micron's broader expansion plans and will establish...
